• Session Required
  • numerator: 分子
  • denominator: 分母
  • step: 汇报周期（秒为单位）

Request

{ "tags": "", "step": 60, "numerator": "$(cpu.idle)", "metric": "test.idle", "id": 16, "endpoint": "testenp", "denominator": "$#" }

Response
